en-US.summary: A collection of transformational and faith-inspiring Christian podcasts from Edifi.
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell Christian Podcast to play Rick Warren's podcast
Alexa, ask Christian Podcast to search for podcasts about resurrection
en-US.name: Christian Podcast
en-US.description:
"The earth shall be full of the knowledge of the Lord as the waters cover the sea." (Isaiah 11:9)  

Edifi is filled with the top Christian podcasts all in one place. With the Christian Podcast Skill, you can easily listen to the latest episodes featured on Edifi along with popular channels. You can also quickly search for new podcasts by channel or topic, and discover phenomenal, new Christian podcasts in the process.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
You can say...
-Alexa, open Christian Podcast
-Alexa, tell Christian Podcast to play featured episodes
-Alexa, tell Christian Podcast to play Rick Warren's podcast
-Alexa, ask Christian Podcast to search for podcasts about resurrection
